title: TSMC’s Huang Says Key to Managing FX Exposure Is Keep It Simple
description: When you’re a dominant company in a small economy with huge overseas earnings, the best way to manage your exposure to the vagaries of the currency market is to keep it simple, according to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s Wendell Huang.
content: When you’re a dominant company in a small economy with huge overseas earnings, the best way to manage your exposure to the vagaries of the currency market is to keep it simple, according to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s Wendell Huang.
